title: Readers Reply to President Biden on Inflation
sub_head: Vladimir Putin can’t be blamed for everything.
body:
Regarding President Biden’s “My Plan for Fighting Inflation” (op-ed, May 31): The first day Joe Biden took office, Vladimir Putin shut down the Keystone XL pipeline. Then, he forced the U.S. to allow the completion of the Nord Stream 2 pipeline. Mr. Putin then announced that no more oil-drilling leases would be allowed on U.S. public land or water.
Mr. Putin is now attempting to raise U.S. taxes and spend trillions of U.S. taxpayer dollars, further fueling runaway U.S. inflation, the likes of which Americans haven’t seen in decades.
